title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions      George Washington Birthplace National Monument is located in the Northern Neck of Virginia  Â    Directions to George Washington Birthplace National Monument: From Fredericksburg/I-95: Exit I-95 at Exit 130A and continue onto Route 3 East. Follow Route 3 East for 38 miles. Look for Route 204, which is on the left. After turning down Route 204, entrance to park is approximately 2 miles. Turn right at traffic circle for Visitor Center entrance. From Route 301: Follow Route 3 East approximately 12 miles. Take the left at Route 204.After turning down Route 204, entrance to park is approximately 2 miles. Turn right at traffic circle for Visitor Center entrance. From Route 360: Follow George Washington Birthplace signs out of Warsaw, VA. Take Route 3 West approximately 22 miles. Take the right at Route 204. After turning down Route 204, entrance to park is approximately 2 miles. Turn right at traffic circle for Visitor Center entrance. For GPS Devices: For GPS devices please use the following address: 1732 Popes Creek Road Colonial Beach, VA 22443
